raffles.announceInterval: Opened raffles will be announced every $value minute
raffles.announce-raffle: Raffle is running. To enter type $keyword. Raffle is opened for $eligibility
raffles.announce-ticket-raffle: Raffle is running. To enter type $keyword <$min-$max>. Raffle is opened for $eligibility
raffles.cannot-create-raffle-without-keyword: Sorry, $sender, but you cannot create raffle without keyword
raffles.raffle-is-already-running: Sorry, $sender, raffle is already running with keyword !$keyword
raffles.no-raffle-is-currently-running: $sender, no raffles without winners are currently running
raffles.raffle-winner-is: Winner of raffle $keyword is $username! Win probability was $probability%!

bets.running: $sender, bet is already opened! Bet options: $options. Use !bet close 0-$maxIndex
bets.notRunning: No bet is currently opened, ask mods to open it!
bets.opened: New bet '$title' is opened! Bet options: $options. Use !bet 0-$maxIndex <amount> to win! You have only $minutesmin to bet!
bets.closeNotEnoughOptions: $sender, you need to select winning option for bet close.
bets.notEnoughOptions: $sender, new bets needs at least 2 options!
bets.info: Bet '$title' is still opened! Bet options: $options. Use !bet 0-$maxIndex <amount> to win! You have only $minutesmin to bet!
bets.diffBet: $sender, you already made a bet on $option and you cannot bet to different option!
bets.undefinedBet: Sorry, $sender, but this bet option doesn't exist, use !bet to check usage
bets.betPercentGain: Bet percent gain per option was set to $value%
bets.betCloseTimer: Bets will be automatically closed after $valuemin
bets.refund: Bets were closed without a winning. All users are refunded!
bets.notOption: $sender, this option doesn't exist! Bet is not closed, check !bet
bets.closed: Bets was closed and winning option was $option! $amount users won!
bets.timeUpBet: I guess you are too late, $sender, your time for betting is up!
bets.locked: Betting time is up! No more bets.
bets.lockedInfo: Bet '$title' is still opened, but time for betting is up!
bets.removed: Betting time is up! No bets were sent -> automatically closing
bets.error: Sorry, $sender, this command is not correct! Use !bet 0-$maxIndex <amount>. E.g. !bet 0 100 will bet 100 points to item 0.
